Name: Angel's Share No.1
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: STIR heaped spoon of orange marmalade with cognac in base of shaker until marmalade dissolves. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Tangy citrus fruit and cognac smoothed with a hint of vanilla.
History: Created in 2005 by Milo Rodriguez, London.
